description: Whether you're planning a&nbsp;Cinco de Mayo celebration or just looking for a tasty&nbsp;spring cocktail, a Mexican Zombie is perfect for you. This unique Mexican Zombie cocktail features Don Julio Blanco, Reposado, and Mezcal, three Mexican agave spirits, imparting a deliciously nutty flavor that is perfectly complemented by smoky cinnamon.This drink will definitely hit the spot, whether you're toasting the&nbsp;holiday or just looking for something refreshing to enjoy on a spring evening.
